properties.Name: China-Liberia 2021
properties.description: Longest distance on land without crossing and ocean or a major water body. On Google Map the line appear as a curve because of the projection used by Google. However on a globe or in Google Earth the line is perfectly straight. The line is  13517  Km long, crosses 9 time zones and 18 countries and territories. It goes across Liberia, Yvory Coast, Ghana, Burkina Faso, Niger, Chad, Libya, Egypt, the Gaza strip, Israel, Palestine, Jordan, Iraq, Iran, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan and China. The lowest point is at -348m near the Dead Sea and the highest point at 5335m in the north Tanymas Ridge near  Pik Gorbunov, Tajikistan.
